homepage_meta_title: raspb Webservices - Digital Solutions Tailored to Your Needs
homepage_meta_description: Professional web development, CMS solutions and AI services for SMEs, associations and foundations. Transparent, affordable and based on proven raspb philosophy.
homepage_hero_title: Digital experience tailored to your needs
homepage_thisIsUs_subtitle: We are not the typical AI agency or a classic web development studio. We are the booster for small and medium-sized businesses' IT.
homepage_thisIsUs_paragraph1: The combination of a proven technology stack, AI-powered workflows and almost 20 years of project experience creates a unique ecosystem that makes your IT projects succeed: tailor-made solutions that are personal, fast and cost-efficient. Whether it's a simple corporate website, a sophisticated CMS solution, custom business applications or the implementation of innovative AI use cases - we deliver in every discipline, and you get everything you need from a single, hassle-free source.
homepage_thisIsUs_paragraph2: Instead of agency overhead, long coordination loops and hidden costs, you get clear fixed prices, a transparent implementation process and a single point of contact who is responsible for everything from architecture to hosting. That's how IT becomes lean, affordable and future-proof again.
homepage_thisIsUs_paragraph3: You share your idea, we take care of the rest: incredibly fast, significantly more affordable than the competition and at a quality level that will exceed your expectations.
homepage_thisIsUs_paragraph4: We unlock opportunities that were previously reserved for large enterprises with big budgets. Give us a try. It's time for IT to be fun again - inspiring, frustration-free and focused on delivering real value.
homepage_intro_titleFirst: For SMEs, for associations, for foundations, ...
homepage_intro_paragraph1: Everyone who wants to be visible on the Internet needs a website. This is as individual as you are, and wishes and requirements vary. Whether simple online business cards, comprehensive corporate websites or powerful content management platforms. At raspb, you will find the perfect solution for your projects.
homepage_intro_paragraph2: In addition, we also develop complex web applications (PWA) for you on request or support you with individual challenges in your company (freestyle development, special AI use cases).
homepage_intro_paragraph3: Thanks to our unique approach, we can offer the most common IT services incredibly quickly and cost-effectively. You get everything from one source, perfectly coordinated: coherent results, fewer friction points, fewer error risks, less project stress.
homepage_intro_benefitsTitle: You don't have to worry about anything (except describing your idea as detailed as possible). We deliver - in every discipline:
homepage_services_subtitle: From the first idea to the final implementation - we accompany you with modern technology and years of expertise on your path to digital success.
homepage_services_webseiten_description: From elegant one-pagers to comprehensive corporate websites and professional blogs - we develop websites that will inspire your target audience.
homepage_services_webseiten_features_res: Responsive design - perfect display on every device
homepage_services_webseiten_features_mod: State-of-the-art - using the latest web technologies
homepage_services_webseiten_features_eig: Your website, your code - no closed system
homepage_services_webseiten_features_kei: No follow-up costs, no rental model
homepage_services_webseiten_tooltip: We deliver your new website within a few days. Maintenance and hosting are included for the first year. Afterwards you can do whatever you want with your website...
homepage_services_cms_description: A content management system also gives you full control over your content in the future. We develop a customized solution for you that meets all your requirements.
homepage_services_cms_features_datenstru: You can store and manage information objects such as news, dates, products, customers, etc. - whatever you want. Start your personal CMS project with us now.
homepage_services_webanwendungen_descrip: Web and mobile applications - with manageable complexity - can be developed quickly and affordably using the raspb method!
homepage_services_webanwendungen_feature: Your website as an app - or start on a blank slate
PWA - powered by Progressive Web App
Developed applications can be placed in the app stores (iOS & Android)
homepage_services_freestyle_description: Do you want to implement a very specific use case that doesn't fit into any of the categories? We also develop individual components, modules and integrations - according to your specifications.
homepage_services_ki_description: Artificial intelligence (AI) is on everyone's lips, but how can you best make it usable for yourself? We model AI-supported workflows or entire AI applications for your business.
homepage_services_ki_services_beratung_d: Prompt Engineering, Context Engineering, ROI Analysis
homepage_services_ki_services_agenten_de: Custom Chatbots, Content Generation, System Integration
homepage_balance_subtitleFirst: We understand that successful projects require the optimal balance between time, cost and quality.
homepage_balance_subtitleThird: "perfectly balanced" stands for this harmonious coordination of all factors.
homepage_balance_zeit_description: Fast implementation through agile development processes, AI support and proven system of best practice components combined with individual development by experts.
homepage_balance_zeit_modal_paragraph1: Time is a crucial factor in the digital world. While other agencies need months for implementation, we deliver first results within a few days thanks to our unique raspb method.
homepage_balance_zeit_modal_paragraph2: Our secret lies in the perfect combination of proven components, AI-supported development processes and the expertise of our team. Over the years we have developed an ecosystem of reusable components that enables us to implement even complex projects at record speed - without compromising on quality.
homepage_balance_zeit_modal_paragraph3: Agile development methods ensure that you can already give feedback during development and the end result exactly matches your ideas. This not only saves us time, but also ensures that the project is heading in the right direction from the start.
homepage_balance_kosten_description: Transparent fixed prices without hidden costs - no subsequent subscription fees - no forced acceptance. Thanks to the raspb method, we can offer an unbeatable price-performance ratio.
homepage_balance_kosten_modal_paragraph1: No more nasty surprises! At raspb you receive transparent fixed prices without hidden costs from the start. Our intelligent online configurator determines a binding price even before the project begins - based on your specific requirements.
homepage_balance_kosten_modal_paragraph2: Unlike many other providers, we have no monthly subscription fees or forced acceptance. You pay once for the development and receive your finished solution - completely in your possession. The first year of hosting and maintenance is already included, afterwards you can freely decide how to proceed with your project.
homepage_balance_kosten_modal_paragraph3: Thanks to our efficient development methods and the raspb ecosystem, we can offer you an unbeatable price-performance ratio. Quality doesn't have to be expensive - with us you get both: highest standards at fair prices.
homepage_balance_qualitaet_description: Highest standards in design and programming. Proven and tested quality through the use of modern web technologies, frameworks and self-developed modules - created and tested by experts.
homepage_balance_qualitaet_modal_paragra: Quality is non-negotiable at raspb. We exclusively use the latest web technologies and proven frameworks such as SvelteKit, TypeScript, TailwindCSS and Node.js. Every line of code is written by our experts and undergoes strict quality controls.

Our self-developed modules and components have grown over the years and have been tested in countless projects. You benefit from this experience and receive solutions that not only work today, but are also future-proof. Performance, security and user-friendliness are always in focus.

Through continuous code reviews, automated tests and the use of modern development tools, we ensure that your project meets the highest quality standards. The result: robust, scalable and low-maintenance solutions that will give you long-term satisfaction.
homepage_features_subtitle: Our unique selling points make the difference for your success. Find out why customers choose raspb.
homepage_features_allesAusEinerHand_desc: From initial consulting through design and programming to maintenance - we accompany you through the entire process.
homepage_features_ansprechpartner_descri: You have a fixed contact person who looks after your project from start to finish and understands your requirements exactly.
homepage_features_ansprechpartner_contac: Direct line to your project manager
homepage_features_preise_description: Our online configurator gives you clear, binding fixed prices without hidden costs or nasty surprises.
homepage_features_massgeschneidert_descr: Every project is unique. We develop solutions tailored to your needs instead of off-the-shelf products.
homepage_features_qualitaet_description: raspb deliberately positions itself between expensive agencies and cheap website builder tools – with a price-performance ratio that is rarely found in this form. You get custom solutions, clean code and modern architecture, without needing a corporate budget.
homepage_features_qualitaet_point1: Custom solutions instead of templates – no off-the-shelf themes, but tailored implementation of your requirements.
homepage_features_qualitaet_point2: Enterprise standards for performance, security, GDPR compliance & maintainability.
homepage_features_qualitaet_point3: Fair entry prices from a simple digital business card to a business app with complex logic.
homepage_features_schnell_title: Go Live Fast with AI & Proven Tech Stack
homepage_features_schnell_description: raspb combines AI-powered development with a clearly defined solution environment. The result: projects that go live in days or a few weeks, instead of months – without sacrificing quality or stability.
homepage_features_schnell_point1: 10× faster than traditional project approaches – through automation where it makes sense.
homepage_features_schnell_point2: “Perfectly Balanced” philosophy – no over-engineering, focus on what truly creates value.
homepage_features_schnell_point3: Scalable architecture – your solution can easily grow later (PWA, additional features, integrations).
homepage_features_transparenz_descriptio:
At raspb, you know what your solution will cost before the project starts. No hourly billing, no surprises, no fine print.
Projects are planned with buffers and clear milestones – delays are the exception and are communicated openly.
homepage_features_transparenz_point1: Fixed prices instead of time & material – clearly calculated service packages.
homepage_features_transparenz_point2: Full transparency throughout the project – e.g. via a customer dashboard with status, to-dos & timing.
homepage_features_transparenz_point3: Fairness promise: Additional costs due to internal issues at raspb are not passed on to you.
homepage_features_kontrolle_title: No Lock-in: Your Code, Your Control
homepage_features_kontrolle_description:
After project completion, the complete code belongs to you. You decide how to proceed – with raspb, with another service provider or with your own team.
raspb builds on open standards and a flexibly extensible architecture, instead of chaining you to a platform.
homepage_features_kontrolle_point1: 100% code ownership – complete repository, no hidden rights.
homepage_features_kontrolle_point2: No dependency on any provider or website builder – projects can be migrated, extended, further developed.
homepage_features_kontrolle_point3: Empowerment instead of black box – optionally with training & knowledge transfer, so your team can act independently.
homepage_cta_description: Ready for your next digital project? Our intelligent configurator helps you specify your project and you immediately receive a transparent fixed price.
homepage_cta_benefits_zeit_description: Receive a binding fixed price within minutes
homepage_cta_benefits_massgeschneidert_d: Every solution is tailored to your needs
homepage_cta_benefits_contact_descriptio: A fixed contact person accompanies you through the entire project
homepage_cta_note: Tip: The configurator takes only 3-5 minutes and you immediately receive your personal project price. No obligation and free of charge.
